body: At 15th level, the mobile fighter's speed increases by 10 feet. He can take 10 on Acrobatics checks even while distracted or threatened, and can take 20 on an Acrobatics check once per day for every five fighter levels he possesses. This ability replaces armor training 4.
name: Fleet Footed
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Fighter/Fighter Archetypes/Mobile Fighter/Fleet Footed
